description: Demonstrates selective context - each phase explicitly declares what prior context it needs

cells.name: original_design
cells.instructions: Create an original design for a logo. Describe it in detail with colors and shapes. Include the codeword ORIGINAL-V1 in your response. Then route to feedback.

cells.name: feedback
cells.instructions: Review the design and provide constructive feedback. Include the codeword FEEDBACK-F1 in your response. Then route to revision.

cells.name: revision
cells.instructions: Based on the feedback, create a revised version of the logo. Include the codeword REVISION-R1 in your response. Then route to compare.

cells.name: compare
cells.instructions:
You are in the compare phase. You should see ALL prior context (all phases).

Compare the original design (ORIGINAL-V1) with the revised version (REVISION-R1).

IMPORTANT: You should see ALL codewords: ORIGINAL-V1, FEEDBACK-F1, and REVISION-R1.
